pages.title: MEET LEA MATYI

headings.text: Work With the Leader in the PMU Industry

paragraphs: PMU Artist, Trainer, Profesional
Lea is aglobally recognized expert in the field of Permanent Makeup, known for her exceptional skills, innovative techniques, and dedication to elevating industry standards.
With years of hands-on experience,Lea has trained and mentored 1.000+ of PMU professionals worldwide, helping them refine their techniques and build thriving careers.

Lea's expertise has earned her a prominent place among the top PMU educators. Her approach combines precision, artistry, and science to ensure the best possible healed results. She has been invited to speak at international PMU conferences, sharing her knowledge with aspiring and seasoned artists alike.

She has been invited as judge and team leader in world championships likeWULOP, WAPMUA, International PMU Championship and many others.She is also organiser ofPMU events like online conference PMULIVE ¬Æ and WAPMUA 2025.

She is winner too, semifinal in three different techniques.2nd Place WULOPin Hairstrokes,2nd Place in Shaded eyelinerand1st Place in Powderbrows. But the biggest success is not only3rd Place in WORLD FINAL WULOPchampionship in Powderbrows technique but thousands of happy PMU students and clients.

Lea is Founder ofonlinePMULIVE ¬Æ Academy in Europe-an innovative project designed to bring real-time, hands-on PMU education to PMU artistswith over 1000 students from Slovakia and Czech Republic, now bringing the world class education to students all over the world.

In her courses she shares her knowledge and experience through live demonstrations, expert insights, and interactive sessions and her projects have become a must-attend events for professionals eager to enhance their skills and stay ahead in the industry.

Lea‚Äôs teaching philosophy is built on clarity, practicality, and results. She believes thatanyone with the right training and mindset can become a top-tier PMU artist. Her courses are designed to not only teach techniques but also instill confidence and mastery.

Because she is artist WHO works everyday and master WHO teaches regularly not only beginners but advanced artists especially. Owing to Lea's comprehensive experience in instructing and mentoring artists worldwide, she is well aware of the primary issues artists encounter, their toughest challenges in their work, and their biggest anxieties, concerns, and obstacles.
Get access to my entire Success Secret:The Full 5-Module Online Programthatcovers all essential PMU techniques and best practices tohelp you get fully booked!
Get started today before this once in a lifetime opportunity expires.

headings.text: See How Lea's Training Transformed PMU Careers

The course totally exceeded my expectations and I would definitely recommend it to anyone who wants to take their permanent makeup skills to the next level."

Her expertise, systematic approach and attention to detail impressed me from the first moment I started following her work.

Then during the model work she is always by her students' side and gives them maximum attention to work well and without fear. Thanks to Lea, I was able to work on my models and clients right after all the courses."

As a tattoo artist dedicated to classic tattooing, I found out that it's not so easy at all, but at the same time extremely creative and that the PMU community is really friendly. Best decision and I look forward to seeing you at the next trainingüôèüèª"

She meticulously explained every step, demonstrated and guided me so that I felt confident in what I was doing. She found my weaknesses so that I could work on them so that I could do my job at a higher level."
